name: INCallRecord
desc: The details about a call handled by your app.

items.name: init(identifier: String, dateCreated: Date?, caller: INPerson?, callRecordType: INCallRecordType, callCapability: INCallCapability, callDuration: Double?, unseen: Bool?, numberOfCalls: Int?)
items.desc: Creates a call record with the details about the call.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: A unique string that you can use to locate the call in your app.

items.name: var callRecordType: INCallRecordType
items.desc: The type of call that resulted from the attempt.

items.name: var callCapability: INCallCapability
items.desc: The audio and video capabilities of the call.

items.name: enum INCallCapability
items.desc: Constants indicating the capabilities of the call.

items.name: var dateCreated: Date?
items.desc: The date and time at which the call was initiated.

items.name: var callDuration: Double?
items.desc: The duration (measured in seconds) of the call.

items.name: var unseen: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the user has seen the call.

items.name: var numberOfCalls: Int?
items.desc: The number of calls in the call record.

items.name: var participants: [INPerson]?
items.desc: The recipient of the userâ€™s call request.
